title: High Urban Open Defecation Rates
description: As of 2022, 38.56% of the urban population in S√£o Tom√© and Pr√≠ncipe practiced open defecation, indicating a pressing need for improved sanitation infrastructure.

title: Significant Youth Unemployment and Inactivity
description: Projected for 2024, 48.73% of male youth in S√£o Tom√© and Pr√≠ncipe are neither in education, employment, nor training, highlighting challenges in youth engagement and employment opportunities.

title: Minimal Contribution of Insurance and Financial Services to Exports
description: In 2022, insurance and financial services accounted for only 0.24% of S√£o Tom√© and Pr√≠ncipe's service exports, indicating a limited role in the country's export economy.

title: High External Debt Service

title: Minimal Adjusted Net National Income

title: Children Living with HIV
description: In 2022, there were 100 children aged 0-14 living with HIV, highlighting a public health challenge.

title: Low Male Employment to Population Ratio

title: Negligible Merchandise Exports to East Asia & Pacific
